data.name: X3DDefaultSetter
desc: makes it easy to set suitable defaults for illumination and rotation for 3D charts

methods.name: set3DSettingsToDefault
desc: The result may depend on the current chart type and the current shade mode.

methods.name: setDefaultIllumination
desc: set suitable defaults for the illumination of the current 3D chart.
The result may dependent on other 3D settings as rotation or shade mode. It may depend on the current chart type also.

methods.name: setDefaultRotation
desc: sets a suitable default for the rotation of the current 3D chart.
The result may depend on the current chart type.
